original_text: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.
korean_text: 그의 활기찬 걸음이 피곤하여지고 그가 마련한 꾀에 스스로 빠질 것이니

sentences.original_text: The steps of his strength shall be straitened
and his own counsel shall cast him down
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 자신의 계책이 그를 넘어뜨릴 것이다
